tool_description: An all-in-one  language toolkit providing translation, transliteration, pronunciation, dictionary lookup, rhyming words, antonyms, meronyms, hypernyms and hyponyms , text-to-speech capabilities and so much more.
name: LinguaToolbox
title: LinguaToolbox

api_list.name: textToSpeech
api_list.description:
Convert a given text to speech. Get all supported languages in supportegLanguages endpoint. The output mp3 file is available for 5 minutes only. You are advised to download the file if you would like to have it for a longer time period
HOLD TIGHT WE ARE FIXING SOME BUGS WITH AUDIOFILES ;)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com/"

api_list.name: wordPronunciation
api_list.description:
Get the pronunciation of a given word/phrase. Get the list of supported languages in supportedLanguages endpoint
HOLD TIGHT WE ARE FIXING SOME BUGS  WITH AUDIOFILES ;)

api_list.name: getTranslation
api_list.description: Quickly translate text from one language to another. Get the list of supported languages in the supportedLanguages endpoint

api_list.name: getRhymes
api_list.description: Get list of words that rhyme with the provided word. Supports only English words

api_list.name: hyperHyponyms
api_list.description:
Hypernyms are words that represent a broader or more general category, such as "animal" being a hypernym of "cat."
Hyponyms are words that represent a specific or narrower category, such as "cat" being a hyponym of "animal."
Supports only English words

api_list.name: getTransliteration
api_list.description: Transliteration is the process of converting the characters or letters of one writing system into another writing system while preserving the pronunciation. For example, transliterating the Greek word "Γειά σας" into English would result in "Yasas" or " Geia sas" since it represents the same sounds using the Latin alphabet. Get the list of supported languages in the supportedLanguages endpoint.

api_list.name: supportedLanguages
api_list.description: Get a list of supported languages and their codes for text to speech, translation, transliteration and pronunciation endpoints
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com/supportedLanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com/supportedLanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linguatoolbox.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: isRhyming
api_list.description:
Check whether two words rhyme with each other. Returns the phones, stresses and pronunciation of each word.
Supports only English words
WE ARE FIXING THE PRONUNCIATION PART

api_list.name: wordAntonym
api_list.description: Get the antonym(s) of a given English word. Supports only English Language

api_list.name: wordSynonym
api_list.description: Get the synonym(s) of a given English word. Supports only English Language

api_list.name: sentimentAnalysis
api_list.description: This endpoint determines and classifies the sentiment or emotional tone of a piece of text, such as positive, negative, or neutral.

api_list.name: stressPatterns
api_list.description: Get a list of words with a particular stress pattern. The number 1 indicates primary stress; 2 indicates secondary stress; and 0 indicates unstressed

api_list.name: wordMeronyms
api_list.description:
Meronyms are words or terms that represent the constituent parts or components of a larger whole; for example, "branches" is a meronym of the word "tree" since branches are parts of a tree.
Supports only English words

api_list.name: getEnglishMeaning
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the meaning(s) of a given English word as well as the part of speech. English language supported only

api_list.name: detectLanguage
api_list.description:
Get the language / possible languages that are present in a text.
Due to language similarities, innacuracy may arise when looking up a single word. Kindly provide a minimum of five words or a 5 word sentence for improved accuracy
